title: New Voting Laws Add Hurdles for People With Disabilities
description: Restrictions in several states on mail-in voting are sending more people with disabilities to the polls. What they find isnâ€™t always easy to navigate.
dc:creator: Neelam Bohra
media:credit: Ilana Panich-Linsman for The New York Times
media:description: Laura Halvorson has muscular dystrophy and takes extra precautions to avoid Covid-19. She voted in person last week, venturing into a public place for the first time in years.
